verses.verse: וְזֶ֨ה <S%H2088><s%> ve-Zeh now this הַדָּבָ֜ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var And this [is] the thing אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- you תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh that thou shalt do לָהֶ֛ם la-Hem לְקַדֵּ֥שׁ <S%H6942><s%> le-kad-Desh unto them to hallow אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam לְכַהֵ֣ן <S%H3547><s%> le-cha-Hen them to minister unto me in the priest's office לִ֑י Li; לְ֠קַח <S%H3947><s%> Le-kach Take פַּ֣ר <S%H6499><s%> par bullock אֶחָ֧ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad one בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- young בָּקָ֛ר <S%H1241><s%> ba-Kar bull וְאֵילִ֥ם <S%H352><s%> ve-'ei-Lim rams שְׁנַ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim and two תְּמִימִֽם׃ <S%H8549><s%> te-mi-Mim. without blemish

וְלֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> ve-Le-chem bread מַצּ֗וֹת <S%H4682><s%> matz-Tzot, And unleavened וְחַלֹּ֤ת <S%H2471><s%> ve-chal-Lot and cakes מַצֹּת֙ <S%H4682><s%> matz-Tzot unleavened בְּלוּלֹ֣ת <S%H1101><s%> be-lu-Lot tempered בַּשֶּׁ֔מֶן <S%H8081><s%> bash-She-men, with oil וּרְקִיקֵ֥י <S%H7550><s%> u-re-ki-Kei and wafers מַצּ֖וֹת <S%H4682><s%> matz-Tzot unleavened מְשֻׁחִ֣ים <S%H4886><s%> me-shu-Chim anointed בַּשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> bash-Sha-men; with oil סֹ֥לֶת <S%H5560><s%> So-let flour חִטִּ֖ים <S%H2406><s%> chit-Tim [of] wheaten תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou make אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam.

וְנָתַתָּ֤ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-ta-Ta And thou shalt put אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> o-Tam עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and סַ֣ל <S%H5536><s%> sal basket אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, them into one וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֥ <S%H7126><s%> ve-hik-rav-Ta and bring אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam בַּסָּ֑ל <S%H5536><s%> bas-Sal; them in the basket וְאֶ֨ת־ <S%H854><s%> ve-'Et with הַפָּ֔ר <S%H6499><s%> hap-Par, with the bullock וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei and the two הָאֵילִֽם׃ <S%H352><s%> ha-'ei-Lim. rams

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אַהֲרֹ֤ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron And Aaron וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בָּנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav and his sons תַּקְרִ֔יב <S%H7126><s%> tak-Riv, thou shalt bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach unto the door אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed; of the congregation וְרָחַצְתָּ֥ <S%H7364><s%> ve-ra-chatz-Ta and shalt wash אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam בַּמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> bam-Ma-yim. them with water

וְלָקַחְתָּ֣ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ta And thou shalt take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבְּגָדִ֗ים <S%H899><s%> hab-be-ga-Dim, the garments וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֤ <S%H3847><s%> ve-hil-bash-Ta and put אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron upon Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכֻּתֹּ֔נֶת <S%H3801><s%> hak-kut-To-net, the coat וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מְעִ֣יל <S%H4598><s%> me-'Il and the robe הָאֵפֹ֔ד <S%H646><s%> ha-'e-Fod, of the ephod וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָאֵפֹ֖ד <S%H646><s%> ha-'e-Fod and the ephod וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַחֹ֑שֶׁן <S%H2833><s%> ha-Cho-shen; and the breastplate וְאָפַדְתָּ֣ <S%H640><s%> ve-'a-fad-Ta and gird ל֔וֹ lo, בְּחֵ֖שֶׁב <S%H2805><s%> be-Che-shev him with the curious girdle הָאֵפֹֽד׃ <S%H646><s%> ha-'e-Fod. of the ephod

וְשַׂמְתָּ֥ <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Ta And thou shalt put הַמִּצְנֶ֖פֶת <S%H4701><s%> ham-mitz-Ne-fet the mitre עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sho; upon his head וְנָתַתָּ֛ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-ta-Ta and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נֵ֥זֶר <S%H5145><s%> Ne-zer crown הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh the holy עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַמִּצְנָֽפֶת׃ <S%H4701><s%> ham-mitz-Na-fet. upon the mitre

וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ta Then shalt thou take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> She-men oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <S%H4888><s%> ham-mish-Chah, the anointing וְיָצַקְתָּ֖ <S%H3332><s%> ve-ya-tzak-Ta and pour עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sho; [it] upon his head וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֖ <S%H4886><s%> u-ma-shach-Ta and anoint אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בָּנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav his sons תַּקְרִ֑יב <S%H7126><s%> tak-Riv; And thou shalt bring וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֖ם <S%H3847><s%> ve-hil-bash-Tam and put כֻּתֳּנֹֽת׃ <S%H3801><s%> kut-to-Not. coats

וְחָגַרְתָּ֩ <S%H2296><s%> ve-cha-gar-Ta And thou shalt gird אֹתָ֨ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam אַבְנֵ֜ט <S%H73><s%> 'av-Net them with girdles אַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron וּבָנָ֗יו <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nav, and his sons וְחָבַשְׁתָּ֤ <S%H2280><s%> ve-cha-vash-Ta and put לָהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem like מִגְבָּעֹ֔ת <S%H4021><s%> mig-ba-'Ot, the bonnets וְהָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah shall have לָהֶ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem like כְּהֻנָּ֖ה <S%H3550><s%> ke-hun-Nah on them and the priest's office לְחֻקַּ֣ת <S%H2708><s%> le-chuk-Kat statute עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam; shall be theirs for a perpetual וּמִלֵּאתָ֥ <S%H4390><s%> u-mil-le-Ta accomplish יַֽד־ <S%H3027><s%> yad- able אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron וְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> ve-yad- able בָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav. and his sons

וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֙ <S%H7126><s%> ve-hik-rav-Ta to be brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַפָּ֔ר <S%H6499><s%> hap-Par, And thou shalt cause a bullock לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed; of the congregation וְסָמַ֨ךְ <S%H5564><s%> ve-sa-Mach shall put אַהֲרֹ֧ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron and Aaron וּבָנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nav and his sons אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> ye-dei-Hem their hands עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh upon the head הַפָּֽר׃ <S%H6499><s%> hap-Par. of the bullock

וְשָׁחַטְתָּ֥ <S%H7819><s%> ve-sha-chat-Ta And thou shalt kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַפָּ֖ר <S%H6499><s%> hap-Par the bullock לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach [by] the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed. of the congregation

וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ta And thou shalt take מִדַּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> mid-Dam of the blood הַפָּ֔ר <S%H6499><s%> hap-Par, of the bullock וְנָתַתָּ֛ה <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Tah and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on קַרְנֹ֥ת <S%H7161><s%> kar-Not [it] upon the horns הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach of the altar בְּאֶצְבָּעֶ֑ךָ <S%H676><s%> be-'etz-ba-'E-cha; with thy finger וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַדָּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> had-Dam all the blood תִּשְׁפֹּ֔ךְ <S%H8210><s%> tish-Poch, and pour אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- beside יְס֖וֹד <S%H3247><s%> ye-Sod the bottom הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach. of the altar

וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֗ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ta, And thou shalt take אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַחֵלֶב֮ <S%H2459><s%> ha-che-Lev all the fat הַֽמְכַסֶּ֣ה <S%H3680><s%> ham-chas-Seh that covereth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַקֶּרֶב֒ <S%H7130><s%> hak-ke-Rev the inwards וְאֵ֗ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et, הַיֹּתֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H3508><s%> hai-yo-Te-ret and the caul עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- of הַכָּבֵ֔ד <S%H3516><s%> hak-ka-Ved, [that is] above the liver וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> she-Tei and the two הַכְּלָיֹ֔ת <S%H3629><s%> hak-ke-la-Yot, kidneys וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַחֵ֖לֶב <S%H2459><s%> ha-Che-lev and the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that עֲלֵיהֶ֑ן <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hen; is on וְהִקְטַרְתָּ֖ <S%H6999><s%> ve-hik-tar-Ta that [is] upon them and burn הַמִּזְבֵּֽחָה׃ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-chah. [them] upon the altar

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בְּשַׂ֤ר <S%H1320><s%> be-Sar But the flesh הַפָּר֙ <S%H6499><s%> hap-Par of the bullock וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עֹר֣וֹ <S%H5785><s%> o-Ro and his skin וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et פִּרְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H6569><s%> pir-Sho, and his dung תִּשְׂרֹ֣ף <S%H8313><s%> tis-Rof shalt thou burn בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh, with fire מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> mi-Chutz without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> lam-ma-cha-Neh; the camp חַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> chat-Tat it [is] a sin offering הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָאַ֥יִל <S%H352><s%> ha-'A-yil ram הָאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad one תִּקָּ֑ח <S%H3947><s%> tik-Kach; Thou shalt also take וְסָ֨מְכ֜וּ <S%H5564><s%> ve-Sa-me-Chu shall put אַהֲרֹ֧ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron and Aaron וּבָנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nav and his sons אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> ye-dei-Hem their hands עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh upon the head הָאָֽיִל׃ <S%H352><s%> ha-'A-yil. of the ram

וְשָׁחַטְתָּ֖ <S%H7819><s%> ve-sha-chat-Ta And thou shalt slay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֑יִל <S%H352><s%> ha-'A-yil; the ram וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ta and thou shalt take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דָּמ֔וֹ <S%H1818><s%> da-Mo, his blood וְזָרַקְתָּ֥ <S%H2236><s%> ve-za-rak-Ta and sprinkle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv. [it] round about

וְאֶ֨ת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָאַ֔יִל <S%H352><s%> ha-'A-yil, the ram תְּנַתֵּ֖חַ <S%H5408><s%> te-nat-Te-ach And thou shalt cut לִנְתָחָ֑יו <S%H5409><s%> lin-ta-Chav; in pieces וְרָחַצְתָּ֤ <S%H7364><s%> ve-ra-chatz-Ta and wash קִרְבּוֹ֙ <S%H7130><s%> kir-Bo the inwards וּכְרָעָ֔יו <S%H3767><s%> u-che-ra-'Av, of him and his legs וְנָתַתָּ֥ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-ta-Ta and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and נְתָחָ֖יו <S%H5409><s%> ne-ta-Chav [them] unto his pieces וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and its רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sho. and unto his head

וְהִקְטַרְתָּ֤ <S%H6999><s%> ve-hik-tar-Ta And thou shalt burn אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- the whole הָאַ֙יִל֙ <S%H352><s%> ha-'A-yil the whole ram הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-chah, upon the altar עֹלָ֥ה <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lah it [is] a burnt offering ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD רֵ֣יחַ <S%H7381><s%> Rei-ach savour נִיח֔וֹחַ <S%H5207><s%> ni-Cho-ach, it [is] a sweet אִשֶּׁ֥ה <S%H801><s%> 'ish-Sheh an offering made by fire לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. you

וְלָ֣קַחְתָּ֔ <S%H3947><s%> ve-La-kach-ta, And thou shalt take אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et הָאַ֣יִל <S%H352><s%> ha-'A-yil ram הַשֵּׁנִ֑י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni; the other וְסָמַ֨ךְ <S%H5564><s%> ve-sa-Mach shall put אַהֲרֹ֧ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron and Aaron וּבָנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nav and his sons אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> ye-dei-Hem their hands עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh upon the head הָאָֽיִל׃ <S%H352><s%> ha-'A-yil. of the ram
